Rodenpicula:
I have avoided pursuing my vendetta against the goddess of light because I hoped that the time would come when I could bequeath this magical stone to one of my heirs capable of attaining true power and insight. Now use that Resonance Amulet wisely. I do not know how you will deal with the truth -- that we were all created as weapons to help the Giants oppose the gods... But bear this in mind: the future is open to you, and you must now judge how to use your strength for yourself. ... I must pursue and destroy our injured enemies... Farewell...
"Wait..."
